title: Understanding Shakespeare: his stagecraft
creator_credit: Gateway Educational Films, Murtin Productions and W. Hugh Baddeley
brief_description: Designed to show that the physical properties of the Elizabethan theatre materially affected the work of Elizabethan dramatists. Illustrates the features of the 16th century theatres. Extracts from Shakespeare’s plays are performed on a reconstruction of the stage of the Glove Theatre, showing the use of dramatic techniques.
